en: Can not match with any color.
zh: 不可以与任何颜色匹配。

en: Embed an item into the gem. It will remove the rune of the gem.
zh: 把道具镶嵌到宝石中。会移除宝石上的符文。

en: Effect when the cell is eliminated.
Stack and process one by one when the matching stops.
zh: 堆叠起来并在匹配停止时一个接一个地处理。

en: Effect when the this Item is placed into the board.
zh: 当此道具被放置到棋盘时的效果。

en: Effect when the this Item is placed into the board. And then the Item will return to Bag.
zh: 当此道具被放置到棋盘时的效果。之后道具会放回到包。

en: Removed until the end of level.
zh: 直到关卡结束前被移除。

en: Effect all gems while this Item is on board
zh: 当此道具在棋盘上时，影响所有的宝石。

en: The cells within the distance of n. 0 means the cell itself.
zh: 距离在n之内的格子。0表示格子本身。

en: Add addition score to each gem that this Item eliminated.
zh: 使此道具消除的宝石增加额外的分数。

en: You can drag this Item to Bag in order to exchange another item.
zh: 你可以将此道具拖拽到包来交换一个新的道具。

en: Place a satisfied Item to this Item in order to form a combine Item. Basiclly new Item have the effects of both.
zh: 将一个满足条件的道具放到此道具上来组合一个新道具。通常新道具拥有两个道具的效果。

en: The horizontal cells would be Board Size x6, the vertical cells would be Board Size x2.
zh: 横向的格子数将会是 棋盘大小 x6，纵向的格子数将会是 棋盘大小 x2。

en: Minimum number of gems required to upgrade Board Size: %d\nMinimum number of gems: %d
zh: 升级棋盘大小所需最少宝石数量：%d\n最少宝石数量：%d

en: Drop the item here to exchange another item.
zh: 把道具拖拽到这来交换另一个道具。

en: Roll the board, unpinned and unfrozen gems will be replaced to new ones, then draw new items.
zh: 滚动棋盘，未固定跟未冰冻的宝石会被替换成新的，然后抽取新的道具。

en: Start matching patterns and get score.
Gem can have up to 2 enchantments
You can have up to 7 relics
You have used up swaps but didn't reach the target score.
zh: 你已经用完交换次数却没有达到目标分数。

en: Eliminate one random rune after next roll.
zh: 在下次滚动之后消除一种随机的符文。
1个随机的宝石 基础分数 +1。

en: Turn 2 random gems to Wild until the end of level.
zh: 使2个随机的宝石变为 w_wild直到关卡结束。

en: Place 3 random Items from Bag to Board.
zh: 从包中放置3个随机道具到棋盘上。

en: Explode and eliminate cells in {range_i} w_range at 2 random locations.
zh: 在2个随机的位置爆炸并消除{range_i}w_range内的格子。

en: Duplicate 1 random Item on Board to a random location.
zh: 复制1个棋盘上的随机的道具并放到随机的位置。

en: +{percentage}% of the target score and +{basic_value} score. (Not affected by combos)
zh: +{percentage}%的目标分数并+{basic_value}分数。（不会受连击影响）

en: w_quick: Change gem to red color temporarily.
zh: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为红。

en: w_quick: Change gem to orange color temporarily.
zh: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为橙。

en: w_quick: Change gem to green color temporarily.
zh: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为绿。

en: w_quick: Change gem to blue color temporarily.
zh: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为蓝。

en: w_quick: Change gem to pink color temporarily.
zh: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为粉。

en: w_quick: Pin the cell and if it is on one or more patterns, pin those cells as well.
zh: w_quick：固定格子并且如果在一个或多个图案中，把那些格子也固定。

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
zh: w_eliminate：(w_active) 爆炸并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

en: w_eliminate by [b]Bomb[/b]: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
zh: 被炸弹w_eliminate：(w_active) 爆炸并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.\n(If eliminated after 'Chain Bomb', w_range become that 'Chain Bomb's +1, and w_power become that 'Chain Bomb's +2.)
w_eliminate: (w_active) Cost 6 coins to explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range, earn 0-3 coins for each cell eliminated.
w_quick: Setup a minefield within {setup_range} w_range, and if any cell in that area is eliminated, (w_active)an explosion will occur on that cell and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
zh: w_quick：在{setup_range}w_range设置地雷阵，如果区域内的格子被消除，(w_active)一个爆炸将会在那个格子发生并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

en: When an explosion occurs: (w_active) Eliminate 1 random adjacent cell.\nw_eliminate by [b]Bomb[/b]: (w_active) Eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
w_place: Make two copies of this Item into adjacent cells.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate all connected cells with the same color of this.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Connect all 'Lightning's, eliminate cells on between.
w_quick: Turn target and 3 random gems to w_wild type until the end of level.
zh: w_quick：使此宝石与3个随机的宝石直到关卡结束前变为w_wild。

en: w_eliminate: Sets the cell to burning state.
w_eliminate: (w_active) If this is the last item activated. Eliminate all cells.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate all cells. (Only activate if this is the first item activated.)
w_quick: Target non-w_colorless gem turn to [color=gray][b]Colorless[/b][/color] until the end of level, draw 2 items.
zh: w_quick：使一个非w_colorless宝石直到关卡结束前变为w_colorless，抽2个道具。

en: w_eliminate: +{value} score for each different Item. (Not affected by combos)
zh: w_eliminate：棋盘上每有一个不同的道具则+{value}分数。（不会受连击影响）

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Jump to a cell and eliminate it within 2 w_range. Repeat 2 times.
zh: w_eliminate：(w_active) 跳到一个2w_range内的格子并消除它。重复2次。

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Jump to a cell and eliminate it within 2 w_range. If jump to another 'Rabbit', add a new 'Rabbit' to Bag. Repeat 1 time.
w_place: If this item is placed from Bag, place another [color=gray][b]Animal[/b][/color] from Bag to Board.
w_place: Place another [color=gray][b]Animal[/b][/color] from Bag to Board.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Consume a [color=gray][b]Food[/b][/color] on the board, gain score it has.
Turn mounted and this Item into a new Item.
Eliminate all cells this item traveled.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate a row on a random direction. (Eliminated by 'Iai Cut' will add one direction, Max 3)
When an item is activated, move it to the closest 'Magnet'.

zh: w_eliminate：+{value}分数倍率直到这次匹配结束。

en: w_aura: All gems +{value} score.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Gems in 1 w_range -1 base score.
zh: w_aura：宝石+{value}分数。\nw_eliminate：(w_active)1w_range内的宝石基础分数-1。

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Turn 5 random gems to w_wild until the end of level.
zh: w_eliminate：(w_active) 使5个随机的宝石直到关卡结束前变为w_wild。

en: w_aura: All gems +7 score.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Gems in 1 w_range get +1 score permanently.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Turn gems in 1 w_range to Wild until the end of level.
w_quick: Target Item +10 w_power until the end of level.
zh: w_quick：使目标道具直到关卡结束前获得+10w_power。

en: w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate 2 random cells in 2 w_range. Repeat 2 times.
zh: w_eliminate：(w_active)消除2w_range内的2个随机格子。重复2次。

en: Bombs will activate when cells next to are eliminated.
zh: 当旁边的格子被消除时，炸弹会被激活。

en: Once per level, before the matching ends, perform another rolling and matching, repeat 1 time.
zh: 每关卡一次，在匹配即将完成时，执行一次滚动与匹配，重复1次。

en: The upper and lower parts of the Board are connected.
zh: 棋盘的上下部分相互链接。

en: Every 5 Combos, get +4 Score Mult in that Combo.
zh: 每当有5个连击，那次连击获得+4分数倍率。

en: When matching at least 3 Destroy runes: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range_i} w_range at random location.
zh: 当匹配到至少3个破坏符文时：(w_active) 在随机的位置爆炸并消除{range_i}w_range内的格子。

en: When matching at least 3 Grow runes: +{base_value} Score and get Score of {percentage}% of Target Score.
zh: 当匹配到至少3个生长符文时：+{base_value}分数并且获得目标分数{percentage}%的分数。

en: When matching at least 3 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Duplicate 1 random gem from Hand.
zh: 当匹配到至少3个灵智符文时：(w_active) 复制手中的1个随机宝石。

en: When matching at least 1 Wisdom, and 2 Grow runes:
zh: 当匹配到至少1个灵智、和2个生长符文时：

en: When matching at least 2 Destroy, and 1 Grow runes: +1 Swaps.
zh: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、和1个生长符文时：+1 交换次数。

en: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes: +{value} Mult.
zh: 当匹配到至少2个灵智、和1个生长符文时：+{value}倍率。

en: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes:
zh: 当匹配到至少2个灵智、和1个生长符文时：

en: When matching at least 2 Destroy and 1 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Delete 1 random gem from Hand.
zh: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、和1个灵智符文时：(w_active) 从手中删除1个随机的宝石。

en: When matching at least 2 Destroy and 1 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Eliminate 1 most valuable gem.
zh: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、和1个灵智符文时： (w_active) 消除1个最有价值的宝石。

en: When matching at least 1 Destroy, and 2 Grow runes: Coins +{amount}.
zh: 当匹配到至少1个破坏、和2个生长符文时：金币+{amount}。

en: When matching at least 3 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Select 1 random gem, its Base Score +{value}.
zh: 当匹配到至少3个灵智符文时：(w_active) 选择1个随机宝石，它的基础分数+{value}。

en: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes: (w_active) Turn 2 random gems into w_wild in this Level.
zh: 当匹配到至少1个灵智、和2个生长符文时：(w_active) 使2个随机宝石变为w_wild，直到关卡结束。
